name: meatball dog
description:
meatball dog is a game about a dog eating meatballs.

As you can see the main theme of the game is somewhat of a time-traveling adventure. In meatball dog it is the dogs turn, a player will have their own meatball dog, and it is their game that will be added on.

I've also been working on a description and a set of illustrations to go with it.

The meatball universe is a place of unbelievable wonder and awe, filled with beautiful landscapes and enormous, high-powered battleships.

There are three players in this world, and in the meatball world, only one can take a turn. In meatball dog, a player will come up with a description and begin describing a game that they would like to play, as they hunt for a piece of meatball meat. After they have found a piece of meatball meat, they must place it on the board and then it becomes their turn to add more meatball meat to their meatball dog. As meatballs get eaten they take the form of animals such as a cow, a puppy dog, or a cat. Then, the animals are then eaten and in turn become meatball dogs. Meatball dogs act by eating a certain amount of meatballs, and after the meatballs are eaten, the players would change the appearance of their meatball dog.

The game will end when all the meatball dogs have eaten all the meatballs.
